Equivalence for an ordered pair equal to an unordered pair. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jun-2008.)  (Avoid depending on this detail.)

 Equivalence for an ordered pair equal to an unordered pair. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jun-2008.)
statement:
opeqpr.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
opeqpr.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
opeqpr.3 $e |- C e. _V $.
opeqpr.4 $e |- D e. _V $.
opeqpr $p |- ( <. A , B >. = { C , D } <-> ( ( C = { A } /\ D = { A , B } ) \/ ( C = { A , B } /\ D = { A } ) ) ) $.
